email_chain.subject: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We are looking for a suitable vessel to transport 12,500 MT of sunflower seeds from Odessa, Ukraine, to Alexandria, Egypt. The incoterm is CIF. Can you provide a freight quote and vessel options?

Regards,
Anna Lee
Pacific Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi Anna,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the MV "Sea Breeze" (DWT 28,000, LOA 175m) for this voyage. Her current position is near Istanbul. The laycan is flexible, between March 20-25. Our initial freight quote is USD 38 per MT, lumpsum $475,000. Let me know your thoughts.

Best,
Robert Jones
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Robert,

Thanks for the quick response. The USD 38/MT is a little higher than our budget allows. Could you come down to USD 36/MT? Also, please provide the demurrage rate per day.

Thanks,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Anna,

I understand. I can meet you halfway at USD 37/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 8,500 per day. Let me know if this works for you, and we can proceed with the booking.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Robert,

USD 37/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laytime allowed for loading and discharging.

Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Anna,

Laytime allowed is 72 hours for loading and 72 hours for discharging. Let me know if you need any other information.

Best,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quote - Sunflower Seeds from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Robert,

Great. We agree to the terms. Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Dear Anna,

Hope you're having a productive week.

We have an enquiry for the following:

Commodity: Wheat
Quantity: 25,000 MT +/- 10%
Loading Port: Constanta, Romania
Discharge Port: Jeddah, Saudi Arabia
Incoterms: CIF
Laycan: Nov 15-20, 2024

Please provide your best lumpsum freight offer. 

Best regards,
Steve Harding
Fairview Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

Thanks for the enquiry. We have several vessels that could be suitable.

Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 625,000 all in, based on your stated requirements.

What are your target rates for the Bendsura?
Can you confirm the maximum draft at Constanta?

Regards,
Anna Kramer
Global Grain Corp

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Anna,

Thanks for the quick response.

USD 625,000 is a bit high. We were targeting something closer to USD 590,000. 
Maximum draft at Constanta is 11.5 meters.

Any chance of improving your offer?

Best,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Steve,

I've discussed with owners. Best we can do is USD 610,000, given the current market conditions and prompt laycan. Vessel is the *Bendsura*, DWT 35,000 MT, built 2010.

This is our firm offer, valid for 24 hours.

Regards,
Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Anna,

USD 610,000 is still above our target. Would you consider USD 600,000, with a demurrage rate of USD 10,000 per day?

Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah
email_chain.body:
Steve,

Okay, we can agree to USD 600,000 lumpsum and demurrage at USD 10,000 per day. Please confirm acceptance.

Anna

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Jeddah - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Anna,

Confirmed! USD 600,000 lumpsum, demurrage USD 10,000 per day.

Thanks for your assistance.

Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elizabeth,

We have an inquiry for a palm oil shipment from Port Klang to Rotterdam, approximately 15000 MT, CIF terms. Could you please provide vessel options and freight indications?

Best regards,
Charles Bingley
Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Thanks for the inquiry. We can offer the 'ORIENT STAR' (DWT 55000, LOA 190m) for this shipment. Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 750,000, all in. Laycan is February 15-20.

Best,
Elizabeth Bennet
CharterCo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elizabeth,

USD 750,000 is a bit higher than our budget. Can you offer a lower rate? Also, what's the demurrage rate per day?

Regards,
Charles Bingley

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

We can come down to USD 725,000 lumpsum. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. Please advise if this is acceptable.

Best,
Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elizabeth,

USD 725,000 is still a bit above our target. Can you meet us at USD 710,000? We are ready to confirm if the price is right.

Best,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Okay, we agree to USD 710,000 lumpsum, all other terms as previously stated. Please confirm and send the recap.

Best,
Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Palm Oil - Port Klang to Rotterdam - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Dear Elizabeth,

Confirmed at USD 710,000 lumpsum. Thank you for your flexibility.

Best regards,
Charles Bingley
Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Hope you're having a good week.

We have an urgent inquiry for a petcoke shipment of approximately 45,000 MT from Richards Bay, South Africa, to Rotterdam, Netherlands. Could you provide us with your best freight offer for this movement?

Incoterm: FOB Richards Bay.

We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Thank you for the inquiry. We can offer you our MV 'OCEAN SPIRIT' (DWT: 75,000, LOA: 225m) for this voyage. Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 950,000, basis FOB Richards Bay, discharge Rotterdam.

Laycan: February 15-20, 2024.

Please advise if this is of interest.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Global Trade Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Thank you for the prompt response.

USD 950,000 is a bit high for our budget. Could you possibly come down to USD 900,000? Also, what is your demurrage rate in Rotterdam?

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

We can meet you in the middle at USD 925,000. Our demurrage rate in Rotterdam is USD 15,000 per day, pro-rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Global Trade Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

USD 925,000 is acceptable, but we need a loading window of 72 hours in Richards Bay. Is this something you can accommodate?

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Yes, we can accommodate the 72-hour loading window in Richards Bay. So to confirm:

- Vessel: OCEAN SPIRIT
- Cargo: 45,000 MT Petcoke
- Load Port: Richards Bay
- Discharge Port: Rotterdam
- Laycan: February 15-20, 2024
- Freight: USD 925,000 (Lumpsum)
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day, pro-rata
- Loading Window: 72 hours
- Incoterm: FOB Richards Bay

Please confirm these details.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Global Trade Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Petcoke Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Confirmed. All details are correct. Please proceed with the charter party.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Sofia Andrews
Seawise Brokers

email_chain.subject: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Robert,

We have a spot enquiry for approximately 75,000 MT of Petcoke from Houston, USA to Rotterdam, Netherlands on FOB terms. We require a vessel with suitable deadweight and the ability to load at the assigned terminal in Houston.

Please provide a freight indication, along with vessel options and their respective DWT and LOA.

Best regards,
Alex Johnson
SeaFreight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the enquiry. We can offer the vessel 'EVER SUCCESS', DWT 82,000 MT, LOA 225m. She is currently ballasting towards the US Gulf. 

Our initial lumpsum rate is USD 1,275,000, all inclusive.

Laycan: Feb 15-20, Houston

Let me know your thoughts.

Regards,
Robert Williams
Oceanic Trades

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Thanks for the quick response. The 'EVER SUCCESS' looks suitable. However, USD 1,275,000 seems a little high based on current market levels. Can you sharpen your pencil on the lumpsum?

Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the laytime allowed?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Understood on the lumpsum. We can reduce to USD 1,250,000, which is our best offer.

Laytime allowed is 72 hours weather permitting. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Regards,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam - Almost there...
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

USD 1,250,000 is closer to our target. Would you be able to meet us halfway at USD 1,237,500? If so, we can likely confirm this immediately.

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Okay, we agree to USD 1,237,500 lumpsum. Consider the 'EVER SUCCESS' fixed.

Please send over the charter party for review and confirmation.

Thanks,
Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Petcoke - Houston to Rotterdam - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Great news! Charter Party attached. We will review and revert shortly.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olivia,

Marubeni Energy is seeking a vessel for a crude oil shipment from Ras Tanura to Rotterdam. Cargo size is approximately 260,000 MT, +/- 10%. Incoterms are FOB Ras Tanura. Can you offer a suitable VLCC with laycan between November 15-20?

Best regards,
Kenji Tanaka

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Kenji,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the VLCC 'Seafarer Majestic', DWT 318,000, LOA 332m. Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 3,800,000, plus standard commissions. Laycan as requested. 

Please advise if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Olivia Rodriguez
SeaSolutions Maritime

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Olivia,

Thanks for the prompt offer. USD 3.8 million is a bit above our budget. Could you improve the rate? Also, what is the vessel's age and flag? What is the demurrage rate?

Best,
Kenji

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Kenji,

The 'Seafarer Majestic' is 12 years old, flying the Marshall Islands flag. Considering those factors, we can reduce the lumpsum to USD 3,650,000. Demurrage is USD 45,000 per day, pro rata.

Looking forward to your reply.

Regards,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Olivia,

USD 3,650,000 is better. Could you meet us halfway at USD 3,575,000? We are ready to commit if you can agree.

Thanks,
Kenji

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Kenji,

Agreed. USD 3,575,000 it is. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the charter party.

Best,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Crude Oil Inquiry - Ras Tanura to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Olivia,

Confirmed! We accept the lumpsum rate of USD 3,575,000 for the 'Seafarer Majestic'. Please send over the charter party. 

Thank you for your assistance.

Kenji Tanaka

email_chain.subject: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Good morning,

We are seeking a suitable vessel for a petcoke shipment from Richards Bay, South Africa, to Vizag, India. Cargo size is approximately 35,000 MT. Please quote CFR Vizag.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

Thank you for your enquiry. We can offer the MV 'Ocean Dream', DWT 52,000, currently in ballast en route Singapore, ETA Richards Bay around 10 Nov. Our initial lumpsum offer is USD 750,000 CFR Vizag. Laycan 12-15 Nov.

Best regards,
SeaShip Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Good Morning,

Thank you for your quick response. USD 750,000 is above our target. The laycan is suitable. Can you improve on the lumpsum? Also, please confirm the vessel's draft and loading rate at Richards Bay.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

The 'Ocean Dream' has a draft of 12.5 meters. Loading rate at Richards Bay is approximately 10,000 MT per day. We can come down to USD 725,000 lumpsum, CFR Vizag, basis all other details remaining as previously advised.

Best regards,
SeaShip Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Good Day,

Thank you for the updated offer. We appreciate your flexibility. We counter at USD 710,000 lumpsum, CFR Vizag. Please also provide the demurrage rate at both loading and discharge ports.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag
email_chain.body:
Dear Sirs,

We accept your counteroffer of USD 710,000 lumpsum, CFR Vizag. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day at both loading and discharge ports. Please confirm acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
SeaShip Solutions

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Petcoke, Richards Bay to Vizag, MV Ocean Dream
email_chain.body:
Good Day,

Confirmed. We accept the terms as agreed. Please send over the charter party for our review. Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
BulkTrans Chartering

email_chain.subject: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olivia,

We require a vessel for a coal shipment of approximately 75,000 MT from Richards Bay, South Africa to Rotterdam, Netherlands. Incoterms are FOB. Please provide your best freight rate.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Star Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the 'CAPE HOPE', DWT 180,000, LOA 290m. Our initial offer is USD 28.50 per MT, FOB, Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Laycan is November 15-20.

Best regards,
Olivia Davis
OceanConnect

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olivia,

USD 28.50 is a bit high. We were targeting something closer to USD 27.00. Can you work with that?

Also, what is the daily demurrage rate?

Regards,
Ben Carter
Star Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

I've checked with the owners. We can come down to USD 27.75 per MT. Demurrage is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Olivia Davis
OceanConnect

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Olivia,

USD 27.75 is acceptable. We will book the 'CAPE HOPE' for the 75,000 MT coal shipment, Richards Bay to Rotterdam, with the agreed laycan. Please send over the charter party details for review.

Regards,
Ben Carter
Star Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Request: Coal Shipment - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Ben,

Excellent, I am glad we could come to an agreement. The charter party will be sent within the hour.

Best regards,
Olivia Davis
OceanConnect

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Simon,

We are looking to ship approximately 165,000 MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao under FOB terms. Can you please provide a freight indication for a Supramax or Ultramax vessel?

Thanks,
Olivia Chen

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Olivia,

Thanks for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel 'GREAT EXPLORER', DWT 57,500 MT, LOA 189.99 m. Initial freight indication would be USD 24.50 per MT.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Simon Parker

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Simon,

USD 24.50 per MT seems a bit high for current market conditions. Can you work on this? Also, what is the vessel's laycan in Port Hedland?

Regards,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao - Rate Revision
email_chain.body:
Hi Olivia,

We can reduce the rate to USD 23.75 per MT. The 'GREAT EXPLORER' has a laycan of March 28 - April 04 in Port Hedland.

Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao - Laycan Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Simon,

USD 23.75 per MT is acceptable. Can you also provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao - Demurrage
email_chain.body:
Hi Olivia,

Demurrage rate is USD 18,000 per day.

Please confirm if you wish to proceed.

Best,
Simon

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Simon,

We confirm the booking at USD 23.75 per MT, demurrage USD 18,000 per day, laycan March 28 - April 04. Please send the relevant documentation.

Thanks,
Olivia

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Dear Alina,

We have an inquiry for 25,000 MT of wheat from Constanta to Alexandria, CFR terms. Can you check availability for loading window Feb 10-15?

Best regards,
James Parker
SeaShip Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for the inquiry. Let me check with our operations team and get back to you shortly.

Regards,
Alina Kovalenko

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

We can offer the MV 'Bulk Voyager' (DWT 35,000) for that voyage. Our initial offer is a lumpsum rate of USD 425,000, all in, based on your specified laycan. Owners are keen for quick fixture.

Regards,
Alina Kovalenko

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi Alina,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 425,000 is a bit high for current market levels. Can you come down to USD 400,000?

Also, what is the demurrage rate?

Best,
James Parker

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Let me speak to owners. Meet me in the middle at USD 412,500? Demurrage is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata.

Regards,
Alina Kovalenko

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Alina,

Okay, we can agree at USD 412,500. Please send CP for review.

Thanks,
James Parker

email_chain.subject: RE: Freight Inquiry: Wheat - Constanta to Alexandria - CP
email_chain.body:
James,

Great. Attached is the CP. Please confirm acceptance.

Regards,
Alina

email_chain.subject: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Simone,

Good morning. We have a potential vessel for your petcoke shipment from Richards Bay to Ghent. Please see details below:

- Commodity: Petcoke
- Quantity: 65,000 MT +/- 10%
- Incoterms: FOB Richards Bay
- Vessel: MV NORTHERN STAR
- Lumpsum Freight: USD 975,000

Laycan: August 5-15, 2024.

Please advise if you are interested.

Best regards,
Lars Jensen
Nordic Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Lars,

Thanks for the prompt offer. The lumpsum seems a bit high. Could you provide some more information on the vessel? Specifically, DWT and LOA?

Also, is the laycan flexible at all? We are ideally looking at August 8-18, 2024.

Regards,
Simone Duval
Galactic Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Simone,

The MV NORTHERN STAR has a DWT of 82,000 MT and an LOA of 225 meters. 

We can likely accommodate your preferred laycan of August 8-18, 2024, but please confirm your intended loading rate per weather working day. To reflect the laycan change and potentially higher port costs, we would need to adjust the lumpsum to USD 990,000.

Best regards,
Lars Jensen
Nordic Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Lars,

We are looking at a loading rate of 15,000 MT PWWD. USD 990,000 is still a little rich for our blood. Would you consider USD 970,000?

Best,
Simone Duval
Galactic Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Simone,

After some internal discussion, we can agree to USD 970,000 lumpsum, with laycan August 8-18, 2024. Demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day or pro-rata. 

Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with subjects lifted and issue a recap.

Best Regards,
Lars Jensen
Nordic Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Petcoke Shipment - Richards Bay to Ghent
email_chain.body:
Dear Lars,

USD 970,000 lumpsum and USD 12,000 demurrage are acceptable. Please proceed with subjects lifted and issue the recap.

Thanks,
Simone Duval
Galactic Shipping

email_chain.subject: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

We have an urgent requirement to ship approximately 35,000 MT of Phosphate Rock from Casablanca to Santos, Brazil. Could you please provide vessel options and a freight indication? We are looking for a vessel with a suitable laycan window between Nov 22nd and Nov 26th. Terms are FOB Casablanca.

Best Regards,
Alex Korsakov
Alpha Trading

email_chain.subject: RE: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the inquiry. I can offer the MV 'OCEAN EXPLORER', DWT 45,000, LOA 190m. Vessel is currently discharging in Rotterdam and will be prompt to reposition. Initial freight indication is USD 38/MT, all in.

Laycan range is workable, but will confirm firm dates shortly. Demurrage is USD 16,000 per day.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best,
Sofia Garcia
Bermuda Shipping

email_chain.subject: RE: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos
email_chain.body:
Sofia,

Thanks for the prompt reply. USD 38/MT is a bit higher than our budget. We were targeting something closer to USD 35/MT. Also, what are the confirmed laycan dates for the OCEAN EXPLORER?

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: RE: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Owners are willing to come down slightly. I can confirm USD 36.50/MT. The vessel is now firm for laycan November 23rd - November 26th Casablanca.

Please advise soonest, as other parties are showing interest.

Best,
Sofia

email_chain.subject: RE: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos
email_chain.body:
Sofia,

USD 36.50 is still a bit rich. Given current market conditions, we can only offer USD 35.50/MT.

Can you get owners to agree?

Alex

email_chain.subject: RE: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos - FINAL
email_chain.body:
Alex,

I have managed to convince the owners to accept USD 35.50/MT. Consider it fixed. Please send recap.

Regards,
Sofia

email_chain.subject: RE: Phosphate Rock Inquiry - Casablanca to Santos - FINAL
email_chain.body:
Sofia,

Excellent. Recap sent.

Thanks,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Petcoke - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Carlos,

Good morning. Seahawk Brokers is pleased to offer a freight opportunity for 50,000 MT of Petcoke from Richards Bay, South Africa, to Rotterdam, Netherlands, under FOB terms.

We can nominate the vessel 'CAPE HORN' (DWT 82,000 MT, LOA 290m) for this voyage. Laycan is tentatively scheduled for February 15-20, 2024. 

Initial freight indication is USD 32.00 per MT.

Please advise if you are interested.

Best regards,
Anna Kowalski
Seahawk Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Petcoke - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Anna,

Thanks for the quick offer. USD 32.00 seems a bit high for current market conditions. Could you possibly reduce that to USD 30.50 per MT? Also, can you confirm the daily demurrage rate?

Thanks,
Carlos Rodriguez
Atlantic Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Petcoke - Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Elizabeth,

We have a client looking to move iron ore from Tubarao, Brazil, to Qingdao, China, under a COA for the next 12 months. Volumes are approx. 150,000 MT per month, +/- 10% MOLOO. Incoterms are FOB Tubarao.

Could you indicate your interest and provide a lumpsum indicative figure per shipment?

Best regards,
Charles Bingley
Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Charles,

Thank you for the inquiry. Yes, we are interested. 

Indicative lumpsum offer is USD 3,750,000 per shipment, basis our standard terms and conditions.

We would need firm cargo details and loading/discharging rates for a more precise offer. Also, could you please specify the desired laycan window for the first shipment?

Best,
Elizabeth Darcy
Rosing's Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Elizabeth,

Thanks for the prompt response.

Cargo details are standard Tubarao export grade iron ore. Loading rate is approx. 50,000 MT per day, SHINC. Discharge rate Qingdao is 30,000 MT per day, SHINC. Laycan for the first shipment is ideally April 15-20, 2024.

Your lumpsum figure seems a bit high. Can you review, considering the consistent monthly volume?

Regards,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Charles,

Understood on the details. Considering the volume commitment and discharge rates, we can revise our offer to USD 3,600,000 per shipment. This is our best offer.

What are your thoughts?

Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Re: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Elizabeth,

USD 3,600,000 is closer to our target. Could you also provide details on the vessel you would plan to use - DWT and LOA, for port compatibility checks on our end?

Best,
Charles

email_chain.subject: Re: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Charles,

We would likely employ a Capesize vessel, typically around DWT 180,000 and LOA 290m. Specific vessel details will be confirmed closer to each shipment date.

To proceed, we would need a formal offer letter from your clients. Also, please confirm acceptance of our revised lumpsum rate of USD 3,600,000 per shipment.

Regards,
Elizabeth

email_chain.subject: Re: COA Inquiry - Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao - ACCEPTED
email_chain.body:
Elizabeth,

Excellent. The client accepts the lumpsum rate of USD 3,600,000 per shipment. Formal offer letter will be sent later today.

Thank you for your assistance.

Charles

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 38.00/MT is a bit above our target. We were hoping for something closer to USD 35.00/MT. Can you sharpen your pencil?

Regards,
Sarah Kruger
Swift Bulk Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke Shipment - Long Beach to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kruger,

I have reviewed the market conditions. We can meet you halfway at USD 36.50/MT. Laycan is flexible within the second half of April.

Best regards,
Mark Janssen
Oceanic Trade Lines

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke Shipment - Long Beach to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Janssen,

USD 36.50/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the demurrage rate at both loading and discharging ports.

Regards,
Sarah Kruger
Swift Bulk Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke Shipment - Long Beach to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Kruger,

Demurrage is USD 25,000 per day at both loading and discharging ports.

Best regards,
Mark Janssen
Oceanic Trade Lines

email_chain.subject: Re: Enquiry: Petcoke Shipment - Long Beach to Qingdao - CONFIRMED

Regards,
Sarah Kruger
Swift Bulk Shipping

email_chain.subject: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Hope you're having a good week. We have an enquiry for a wheat shipment of approximately 35,000 MT from Santos, Brazil, to Casablanca, Morocco, CFR terms. Laycan is flexible, ideally between Feb 15-25. Could you provide us with a freight indication?

Best regards,
Marco Rossi
Ocean Star Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Hi Marco,

Thanks for the enquiry. We can offer the M/V 'SEA BREEZE' (DWT 55,000 MT, LOA 190m) for this voyage. Our initial lumpsum rate is USD 875,000, CFR terms. Laycan Feb 15-25 is acceptable. What do you think?

Regards,
Sofia Andrews
Global Grains

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Hi Sofia,

USD 875,000 seems a little high. Considering current market conditions, can you sharpen your pencil? Also, please confirm the demurrage rate at both ports.

Best,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Marco,

Understood. We can come down to USD 860,000. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day at both Santos and Casablanca. Let me know if that works.

Sofia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Sofia,

USD 860,000 is better, but we are still targeting USD 850,000. Can you meet us in the middle at USD 855,000? If so, we have a deal.

Regards,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Marco,

Okay, USD 855,000 it is. Please confirm and we'll prepare the recap.

Best,
Sofia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Enquiry - Wheat - Santos to Casablanca - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Sofia,

Confirmed. Please send the recap at your earliest convenience.

Thanks,
Marco

email_chain.subject: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Anders,

Hope you are well.

We have a client looking to move approximately 65,000 MT of petcoke from Richards Bay, South Africa to Rotterdam, Netherlands on a single vessel.

Incoterm: FOB Richards Bay.

Laycan: August 15-25, 2024.

Please advise on your best freight idea, vessel options and any restrictions.

Kind regards,
Leo Ferreira
Global Charters Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Leo,

Thank you for the inquiry.

We can offer the M/V 'NORDIC STAR', DWT 75,000, LOA 225m, to perform this voyage.

Indicative freight rate is USD 28.50 per MT, FOB Richards Bay, Laycan as requested.

Demurrage: USD 22,000/day pro-rata.

Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Anders Jorgensen
Nordic Bulk ASA

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Anders,

Thanks for the prompt response. USD 28.50/MT is a bit high, based on current market assessments. Would you be able to come down on the rate?

Could you also share the vessel's full style and class details?

Regards,
Leo

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Leo,

Okay, we can offer USD 27.75 per MT, all other terms as before. This is our best offer.

Vessel's full style is: Gearless Bulk Carrier, ABS Class.

Let me know if this works for your client.

Anders

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Anders,

Good morning.

I am pleased to confirm we can fix the M/V 'NORDIC STAR' at USD 27.75/MT, FOB Richards Bay, Laycan August 15-25, 2024, Demurrage USD 22,000/day pro-rata. Subject to stems and receiver approval.

Please send us your proforma charter party for review.

Best regards,
Leo

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Leo,

Excellent news! Proforma charter party attached.

Please confirm receipt.

Regards,
Anders

[ATTACHMENT: NORDIC STAR - Richards Bay - Rotterdam - Proforma CP.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Quote Request: Petcoke from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - 65,000 MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Anders,

Received with thanks. Our legal team is reviewing the Proforma. We will come back to you with any amendments as soon as possible.

Best,
Leo

email_chain.subject: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Hope you are doing well.

We have a client looking to ship approximately 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarao, Brazil, to Rotterdam. Could you indicate if you have any suitable vessels open for this route in late August?

Terms would be FOB Tubarao.

Best regards,

Sofia Alvarez
Global Shipping Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

Thanks for your inquiry. Yes, we do have a couple of options. MV 'Starlight Voyager' (DWT 175,000) is currently ballasting towards South America and could be positioned in Tubarao around August 25th. We are offering a lumpsum of USD 950,000, all inclusive, basis good berth at both load and discharge ports.

Please let me know if this is of interest.

Regards,

Roberto Bianchi
Maritime Logistics Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thank you for the prompt reply. The 'Starlight Voyager' looks promising. However, the lumpsum seems a bit high. Can you provide a breakdown of the estimated voyage duration and daily hire equivalent?

Also, what is the demurrage rate?

Best regards,

Sofia Alvarez
Global Shipping Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

The estimated voyage duration is approximately 25 days, equating to a daily hire rate of USD 38,000. Demurrage is USD 25,000 per day. We can come down to USD 925,000 lumpsum basis 10 days free laytime at load port and 8 days free laytime at discharge port. Beyond that demurrage as stated above.

Let me know your thoughts.

Regards,

Roberto Bianchi
Maritime Logistics Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Thanks for the revised offer. I have discussed with my client, and they have authorized me to counter at USD 900,000 lumpsum, with the laytime as per your offer. Can you accept that?

Best regards,

Sofia Alvarez
Global Shipping Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sofia,

USD 900,000 is too low, given current market conditions. However, to secure this fixture, we can meet you in the middle at USD 912,500 lumpsum, all other terms as previously agreed. This is my best and final offer.

Let me know quickly if you can confirm.

Regards,

Roberto Bianchi
Maritime Logistics Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Enquiry: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Roberto,

Confirmed! We accept USD 912,500 lumpsum for the iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Rotterdam on the MV 'Starlight Voyager,' laytime as per your offer, demurrage at USD 25,000 per day. Please send over the recap for signature.

Best regards,

Sofia Alvarez
Global Shipping Solutions

email_chain.subject: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Petra,

Hope you are well.

We have an enquiry for Urea Granular, about 45,000 MT, Yuzhny to Santos. Incoterm is FOB. Laycan is August 12-16. Can you please check for suitable tonnage and indicate your best lumpsum idea, owners willing to consider max 5% lighter.

Best regards,
Steve Olson
Sea Scout Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

Thanks for the prompt enquiry. I can offer MV 'GREAT NAVIGATOR' (DWT 52,000, LOA 190m) prompt and clean. Owners idea lumpsum USD 1,620,000, freight prepaid. All details without guarantee. Demurrage rate USD 22,000 per day.

Regards,
P. Bauer
Bulk Trans

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Petra,

Thanks for your quick response. The lumpsum seems a bit high. Can you ask your owners to consider USD 1,550,000? Also, please confirm loading rate and discharge rate.

Best,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

Spoke with owners. They are willing to come down to USD 1,590,000, their best offer.

Loading rate is 10,000 MT per weather working day, SHINC.
Discharge rate is 8,000 MT per weather working day, SHINC.

Regards,
P. Bauer

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos
email_chain.body:
Dear Petra,

Thanks for the update. Client counter offers USD 1,575,000.

Best,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

After long discussions, owners agree to USD 1,575,000. Please confirm acceptance so I can send recap to all.

Regards,
P. Bauer

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Enquiry: Urea Granular - Yuzhny to Santos - CONFIRMED
email_chain.body:
Dear Petra,

Confirmed! Please send recap. Thanks for your assistance.

Best,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Copper Concentrate - Antofagasta to Shanghai

Oceanic Brokers

Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Copper Concentrate - Antofagasta to Shanghai
email_chain.body:

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 45/MT is a bit higher than our client's target. Could you potentially offer a reduced rate, considering the volume? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day, and the laytime allowed?

Laura Peters
Oceanic Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Copper Concentrate - Antofagasta to Shanghai

Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Copper Concentrate - Antofagasta to Shanghai

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Copper Concentrate - Antofagasta to Shanghai - Confirmation

email_chain.subject: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Bill,

Hope you're well. Got a prompt inquiry for 60,000 MT of soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam, CIF basis. Laycan is Sep 5-10. Anything open?

Best,
Anh

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Anh,

Thanks for the shout. I can offer the *MV Bulk Voyager*, DWT 75,000. She's finishing discharge in Brazil next week. Lumpsum offer USD 1,950,000, all in. Laycan as requested. Let me know your thoughts.

Cheers,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Bill,

Appreciate the prompt offer. $1.95M is a bit high based on current market rates. Can you sharpen your pencil? The receivers are quoting closer to $1.8M.

Also, can you confirm the vessel's max draft at Rotterdam and the demurrage rate?

Thanks,
Anh

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Anh,

Understood re: the rate. Best I can do is USD 1,875,000. Rotterdam max draft is 13.5 meters. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata.

Hope this helps.

Regards,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Bill,

Getting closer. Meet me at USD 1,850,000 and we have a deal. Draft and demurrage are acceptable.

Let me know.

Thanks,
Anh

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Anh,

Alright, USD 1,850,000 it is. Consider the *MV Bulk Voyager* fixed for 60,000 MT Soybeans, Santos to Rotterdam, CIF. Laycan Sep 5-10.

Will send the recap shortly.

Best,
Bill

email_chain.subject: Re: Quick Q: Soybean Inquiry - Santos to Rotterdam

Confirmed. Looking forward to the recap.

Thanks,
